imageStringTooLong: The image-string is a maximum of 63 characters.
identStringTooLong: The ident string has a maximum length of 31 characters.
nameTooLong: The name is a maximum of 31 characters.
parameterPromptTooLong: The parameter prompt is a maximum of 31 characters.
emptyParameterName: The parameter name cannot be empty.
invalidParameterName: The parameter name must be in the form Pn, where n is the position of the parameter.
invalidParameterNumber: The parameter names must be numbered consecutively from P1 to P8.
mutualDefOrReq: The DEFAULT clause and the REQUIRED clause are mutually exclusive.
parameterValueDefaultStringTooLong: The parameter default value is a maximum of 94 characters.
mutualQual: The NOQUALIFIERS clause and the QUALIFIER clause are mutually exclusive.
tooManyQualifiers: You can use the QUALIFIER clause up to 255 times in one DEFINE statement.
tooManyKeywords: You can specify up to 255 keywords in a DEFINE TYPE statement.
entityStartNameNotUnique: The first four characters of the name must be unique.
syntaxNotExists: There is no SYNTAX with this name.
typeNotExists: There is no TYPE with this name.
entityOutside: This entity is outside any DEFINE.
cannotFindDefine: Cannot find the DEFINE clause for this entity.
